Articles.Content:
Hello, Im wondering if there is a Shuttle style SRB out there on the Forums like the one pictured below.

The stock SRB is very long and skinny and looks out of place with 3.75m Rockets and is too long for 2.5m Rockets.

I wish the Stock SRB was 1.875m wide as that would look normal with a 3M Rocket and a 1.5m SRB would look normal with a 2.5m Rocket.

Thanks for any interest in helping thank you

-Sam

And the Stock SRB does not work with Tweakscale.

Get KW Rocketry. (The thread says 0.25 but it is fully compatible with 0.90)

Lots of extra tanks, engines, fairings and SRB's

Edited February 15, 2015 by Tex_NL

The KSO mod has some like that but it's a big pack um.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68429-0-23-5-Kerbin-Shuttle-Orbiter-System-v2-08-aka-Kerbin-Mini-Shuttle and this mod has some close http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/38597-Part-Advanced-SRB-WIP-v0-7-by-Kerbal-Science-Foundation
Might also check the CSS mod as well... though the srb is a little fidgety to place on correctly
I also have a reasonable facsimile at 2.5m diameter in Novapunch, there's actually a few different segment lengths of it, with a separate nosecone.
